授業目的: Students will be introduced to a wide range of communication strategies at the intermediate level.
到達目標:
Students will acquire:
* communication skills, including conversation, writing, listening, reading and presentations, advanced expressions, vocabulary, and idioms
授業方法: Lectures, group work, partner activities, presentations.

第1回: Introduction. Developing natural English conversation skills
第2回: Unit 7. There are too many stores!
第3回: Unit 7. There are too many stores!
第4回: Unit 8. Wanted: People who can sing
第5回: Unit 8. Wanted: People who can sing
第7回: Unit 9. What were you doing? Review Test.
第13回: Unit 12. You could be a lifeguard
第14回: Unit 12. You could be a lifeguard. Review Test.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students will usually be assigned homework by the teacher to completed by the next class.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
